price: Na tukamwokoa yeye na Luut'i tukawapeleka kwenye nchi tulio ibariki kwa ajili ya walimwengu wote.
arabic: وَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ وَلُوطًا إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلَّتِي بَٰرَكۡنَا فِيهَا لِلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: Na tukamwokoa yeye na Luut'i na njama zilizo pangwa, wakaelekea kwenye nchi tuliyo ijaalia kheri nyingi kwa watu wote, na tukawapeleka huko Manabii wengi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wanajjaynāhu walūṭan ilā al-arḍi allatī bāraknā fīhā lil'ʿālamīna
